uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.reactome

Class ReactomeWsCallable

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.reactome.ReactomeWsCallable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<uk.ac.ebi.ep.enzyme.model.Pathway>

    public class ReactomeWsCallable
extends Object
implements Callable<uk.ac.ebi.ep.enzyme.model.Pathway>
    Class to retrieve reactions and pathways from Reactome REST web services.
    Author:
    rafa

    • Method Detail

      • call

      • getReaction

        public uk.ac.ebi.ep.enzyme.model.EnzymeReaction getReaction(String reactionId)
                                                     throws ReactomeConnectionException,
                                                            ReactomeFetchDataException
        Gets a reaction (complete with description and xref to Reactome).
        Parameters:
        reactionId - a Reactome reaction stable ID.
        Returns:
        an EnzymeReaction object with name, URL and description (if available).
        Throws:
        ReactomeConnectionException - in case of problem getting the XML from Reactome.
        ReactomeFetchDataException - in case of problem parsing the XML from Reactome.

      • getPathway

        public uk.ac.ebi.ep.enzyme.model.Pathway getPathway(String pathwayId)
                                             throws ReactomeConnectionException,
                                                    ReactomeFetchDataException
        Retrieves one pathway from the Reactome web services.
        Parameters:
        pathwayId - a stable Reactome ID without version (for example, "REACT_21342", not "REACT_21342.1").
        Returns:
        a Pathway with name, description, URL and image (if available).
        Throws:
        ReactomeConnectionException - in case of problem getting the XML from Reactome.
        ReactomeFetchDataException - in case of problem parsing the XML from Reactome.

      • getPathways

        public Collection<uk.ac.ebi.ep.enzyme.model.Pathway> getPathways(String reactionId)
        Gets pathways related to a reaction.
        Parameters:
        reactionId - a Reactome reaction stable ID
        Returns:
        a collection of pathways in which the reaction can be involved, or null if none found.

      • getDescription

        protected String getDescription(String summaryId)
                         throws ReactomeConnectionException,
                                ReactomeFetchDataException
        Retrieves a description of a reaction or pathway.
        Parameters:
        summaryId - A Reactome summary ID.
        Returns:
        a description.
        Throws:
        ReactomeConnectionException - in case of problem getting the XML from Reactome.
        ReactomeFetchDataException - in case of problem parsing the XML from Reactome.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription(ReactomeWsCallable.ReactomeClass reactomeClass,
                    String reactomeId)
                      throws ReactomeServiceException
        Retrieves the description for a Reactome object (reaction or pathway).
        Parameters:
        reactomeId - the Reactome stable ID
        Returns:
        a description for the object.
        Throws:
        ReactomeServiceException - if there is any problem with the web service.
